short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Try any devtools version using this Dev Tools App

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple packaged app lets you try out different versions of Chrome Devtools.

Read more info here:

https://github.com/sandipchitale/DevToolsApp

The app was crashing on Chrome 38.x but is now working in 39.0.2171.65 m.
